sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Badge from '../UI/Badge'; import Timer from '../UI/Timer'; import { User, MedicalRecord, Transaction, SecurityAlert, SystemMetrics } from '../../types'; import { RoleBasedAccessService } from '../../services/rbacService'; interface AdminDashboardProps { user: User; onLogout: () => void; } const AdminDashboard: React.FC = ({ user, onLogout }) => { const [sessionTimeLeft, setSessionTimeLeft] = useState(1800); const [rbacService] = useState(new RoleBasedAccessService()); const [systemMetrics, setSystemMetrics] = useState({ totalUsers: 1245, activeUsers: 342, totalRecords: 98765, securityAlerts: 7, blockchainTransactions: 23456, systemUptime: '99.98%', dataIntegrity: '100%', encryptionStatus: 'Active' }); const [recentSecurityAlerts] = useState([ { id: '1', type: 'suspicious_login', severity: 'high', message: 'Multiple failed login attempts from IP 192.168.1.100', timestamp: '2025-07-04T10:30:00Z', isResolved: false }, { id: '2', type: 'unauthorized_access', severity: 'medium', message: 'Unauthorized access attempt to patient records', timestamp: '2025-07-04T09:15:00Z', isResolved: false }, { id: '3', type: 'system_anomaly', severity: 'low', message: 'Unusual network traffic pattern detected', timestamp: '2025-07-04T08:45:00Z', isResolved: true } ]); const [recentTransactions] = useState([ { id: '1', hash: '0xabc123def456789...', type: 'record_upload', timestamp: '2025-07-04T11:00:00Z', status: 'confirmed', gasUsed: '21000', blockNumber: 12345678 }, { id: '2', hash: '0xdef456abc123789...', type: 'access_grant', timestamp: '2025-07-04T10:45:00Z', status: 'confirmed', gasUsed: '18500', blockNumber: 12345677 } ]); const [allUsers] = useState([ { id: 'admin-1', name: 'John Admin', email: 'admin@hospital.com', role: 'admin', isActive: true, lastLogin: '2025-07-04T11:30:00Z', permissions: [] }, { id: 'doctor-1', name: 'Dr. Sarah Smith', email: 'sarah.smith@hospital.com', role: 'doctor', isActive: true, lastLogin: '2025-07-04T10:15:00Z', permissions: [] }, { id: 'patient-1', name: 'Michael Johnson', email: 'mjohnson@email.com', role: 'patient', isActive: true, lastLogin: '2025-07-04T09:30:00Z', permissions: [] } ]); useEffect(() => { rbacService.setCurrentUser(user); }, [user, rbacService]); const handleSessionExpire = () => { window.confirm('Session expired for security. Please login again.') && onLogout(); }; const handleResolveAlert = (alertId: string) => { // In a real app, this would call an API console.log(`Resolving alert: ${alertId}`); }; const handleUserAction = (userId: string, action: string) => { console.log(`Admin action: ${action} on user ${userId}`); }; const getSeverityColor = (severity: string) => { switch (severity) { case 'high': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; case 'medium': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; case 'low': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; return (
{/* Header */}

🏥 Admin Dashboard

🔒 System Secure 🛡️ Admin Access
{user.name}
{user.role.toUpperCase()}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* System Metrics */}
👥

Total Users

{systemMetrics.totalUsers}

{systemMetrics.activeUsers} active

📁

Medical Records

{systemMetrics.totalRecords}

All encrypted

⚠️

Security Alerts

{systemMetrics.securityAlerts}

Needs attention

🧱

Blockchain Txns

{systemMetrics.blockchainTransactions}

All verified

{/* Security Alerts */}

🚨 Security Alerts

{recentSecurityAlerts.map((alert) => (
{alert.severity.toUpperCase()} {new Date(alert.timestamp).toLocaleString()}

{alert.message}

{!alert.isResolved && ( )}
))}
{/* User Management */}

👥 User Management

{allUsers.map((u) => (

{u.name}

{u.email}

{u.role} {u.isActive ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'}
))}
{/* Recent Blockchain Transactions */}

🧱 Recent Blockchain Activity

{recentTransactions.map((tx) => (

{tx.type.replace('_', ' ').toUpperCase()}

{tx.hash}

Block: {tx.blockNumber} | Gas: {tx.gasUsed}

{tx.status}
))}
{/* System Health */}

💚 System Health

System Uptime {systemMetrics.systemUptime}
Data Integrity {systemMetrics.dataIntegrity}
Encryption Status {systemMetrics.encryptionStatus}
Blockchain Sync Synchronized
IPFS Status Connected
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
